#summary How to check out using svn


`svn checkout https://geobeagle.googlecode.com/svn/`

=Setting up !GeoBeagle=


Eclipse / New Android Project / Create Project From Existing Source / select !GeoBeagle dir

Use GeoBeagle as the Application Name and the Project Name.  Choose Android 1.5 as the Build Target.


Eclipse / Preferences / Set Android SDK Location

Set java1.6

=Setting up the tests=

Eclipse / New Java Project / Create Project From Existing Source / select !GeoBeagleTest dir

Properties / java build path / Projects / add / select !GeoBeagle project 

Properties / Java build path / Libraries / add external jars... / add all powermock jars.

Run / Run Configurations / Junit test / Arguments/ VM Arguments: -Xms256m -Xmx1024m -XX:MaxPermSize=256m
